extension.name: Content - RokComments
extension.author: RocketTheme
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 RocketTheme, LLC. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Plugin to insert JS-Based comments at the end of an article. RokComments supports IntenseDebate and Disqus

field.name: system
field.label: Comment System
field.description: Select the Comment System you would like to use and enter the details in the appopriate fieldaters grouping

field.name: spacer_global
field.label: 'Search Engine Friendly URLs' must be enabled in the Global Configuration for ALL of these comment systems to function properly. It's a good idea for SEO anyway, so just turn it on!

field.name: showcount
field.label: Show Comment Count
field.description: Enable comment count if supported by the Comment System

field.name: showicon
field.label: Show Comment Icon
field.description: Enable comment icon if count is shown

field.name: tagmode
field.label: Tagging mode
field.description: Advanced feature - Leave as default unless you run into uniqueness problems as it makes it easier to move your comments later if needed

field.name: method
field.label: Activation Method
field.description: You can Activate comments by Code {rokcomments}, by Menus + Categories

field.name: d-subdomain
field.label: Disqus Subdomain
field.description: Set the subdomain to what you registered with Disqus, sometimes referred to as the 'short name' (without '.disqus.com').

field.name: d-devmode
field.label: Developer Mode
field.description: Enable this if you are testing behind a firewall or proxy, and not yet on your live site.

field.name: js-domain
field.label: JS-Kit Domain
field.description: Set the domain to what you registered with JS-lot (eg www.yoursite.com).
